comments.author: Dusan (Duke) Vukadinovic
comments.message: I decided at the earliest age that I will never be normal because normal for me is just another word for average so I guess that I fall into category of those people which you addressed as the most problematic to design for :)

comments.author: msr
comments.message: Valuable information! Looking forward to seeing your notes posted. Thank you for sharing the nice article. Good to see your article. poesniper
